org.buildmlearn.appstore.adapters

Class FullScreenImageAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.support.v4.view.PagerAdapter
      • org.buildmlearn.appstore.adapters.FullScreenImageAdapter

  • public class FullScreenImageAdapter
extends android.support.v4.view.PagerAdapter
    An adapter class which populates a full screen image for the screenshots to be viewed better.
